#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  // resubmit after merge4
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  RaftServer& raft_server = this->GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term;


  auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool isLeader = raft_server.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  if(!isLeader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
  Coroutine::Sleep(700000);  // wait 700ms for agreement
  //  if(this->agreedCommands.size()<index){
  //   Log_info("COMMAND NOT AGREED UPON!!!");
  // }
  // else if(this->agreedCommands[index-1]->data_[0]!=to_string(oid)){
  //   Log_info("COMMAND AT INDEX IS DIFFERENT/ WRONG COMMAND AGREED UPON !!!!!!!");
  // }
  if(this->agreedCommands.size()<index || this->agreedCommands[index-1]->data_[0]!=to_string(oid)) return KV_TIMEOUT;
  // also check oid matches!!!!
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  RaftServer& raft_server = this->GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term;
  auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool isLeader = raft_server.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  if(!isLeader){
    Log_info("SERVER NOT LEADER FOR INDEX %d", index);
     return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  Coroutine::Sleep(700000);  // wait 700ms for agreement
  //  if(this->agreedCommands.size()<index){
  //   Log_info("COMMAND NOT AGREED UPON!!!");
  // }
  // else if(this->agreedCommands[index-1]->data_[0]!=to_string(oid)){
  //   Log_info("COMMAND AT INDEX IS DIFFERENT/ WRONG COMMAND AGREED UPON !!!!!!!");
  // }
  if(this->agreedCommands.size()<index || this->agreedCommands[index-1]->data_[0]!=to_string(oid)) {
    Log_info("APPEND TIMED OUT FOR INDEX %d", index);
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  // s->data_.push_back(*v);
  RaftServer& raft_server = this->GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term;


  auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool isLeader = raft_server.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  if(!isLeader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
  Coroutine::Sleep(700000);  // wait 700ms for agreement
  // if(this->agreedCommands.size()<index){
  //   Log_info("COMMAND NOT AGREED UPON!!!");
  // }
  // else if(this->agreedCommands[index-1]->data_[0]!=to_string(oid)){
  //   Log_info("COMMAND AT INDEX IS DIFFERENT/ WRONG COMMAND AGREED UPON !!!!!!!");
  // }
  if(this->agreedCommands.size()<index || this->agreedCommands[index-1]->data_[0]!=to_string(oid)) return KV_TIMEOUT;
  *v = this->kv_storage[k];
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  this->agreedCommands.push_back(v);
  std::string command_type = v->data_[1];
  if(command_type=="get") return;
  string key = v->data_[2];
  string value = v->data_[3];
  if(command_type == "put"){
    this->kv_storage[key] = value;
  }else if(command_type == "append"){
    this->kv_storage[key] += value;
  }
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
